Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
--Put in custom item validation since drill-down LOV will not work with 
--the item's 'Validate from List' property set to Yes. The 'Validate from List'
--property is therefore set to No FOR REF DES and the following user-defined validation is used.
--RB, 10-Sep-2007
BEGIN
 IF :TWO.WUC IS NOT NULL AND :GLOBAL.ac_type = '177' THEN
 VALIDATE_REFDES_ITEM(:TWO.WUC);
 END IF; 
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-NEW-ITEM-INSTANCE
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :GLOBAL.AC_TYPE = '177' THEN
 IF :TWO.CHOICE = 'A' THEN 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TWO.WUC',LOV_NAME,'REFDES_357');
 ELSIF :TWO.CHOICE = 'B' THEN 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TWO.WUC',LOV_NAME,'REFDES_358');
 ELSIF :TWO.CHOICE = 'C' THEN 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TWO.WUC',LOV_NAME,'REFDES_359');
 ELSIF :TWO.CHOICE = 'D' THEN 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TWO.WUC',LOV_NAME,'REFDES_361');
 END IF; 
ELSE 
 IF :TWO.CHOICE = 'A' THEN 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TWO.WUC',LOV_NAME,'WUC_357');
 ELSIF :TWO.CHOICE = 'B' THEN 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TWO.WUC',LOV_NAME,'WUC_358');
 ELSIF :TWO.CHOICE = 'C' THEN 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TWO.WUC',LOV_NAME,'WUC_359');
 ELSIF :TWO.CHOICE = 'D' THEN 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TWO.WUC',LOV_NAME,'WUC_361');
 END IF;
END IF;

Trigger.Name: POST-TEXT-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :TWO.WUC is not null and :TWO.SERIAL IS NOT NULL THEN
 :two.instruct := 'Use mouse or left/right arrow keys to traverse radio buttons,'||CHR(10)||'then press ''Go'' to display form/report';
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TWO.GO',ENABLED, PROPERTY_TRUE);

 IF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF357_GROUP',VISIBLE) = 'TRUE' THEN 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF357_GROUP',ENABLED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 ELSIF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF358_GROUP',VISIBLE) = 'TRUE' THEN 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF358_GROUP',ENABLED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 ELSIF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF359_GROUP',VISIBLE) = 'TRUE' THEN 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF359_GROUP',ENABLED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 ELSIF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF361_GROUP',VISIBLE) = 'TRUE' THEN 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF361_GROUP',ENABLED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 END IF;
ELSE
 :two.instruct := ''; 
END IF;

Trigger.Name: KEY-NEXT-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :TWO.WUC IS NOT NULL AND :TWO.SERIAL IS NOT NULL THEN
 IF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF357_GROUP',VISIBLE) = 'TRUE' THEN 
 GO_ITEM('TWO.CF357_GROUP');
 ELSIF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF358_GROUP',VISIBLE) = 'TRUE' THEN 
 GO_ITEM('TWO.CF358_GROUP');
 ELSIF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF359_GROUP',VISIBLE) = 'TRUE' THEN 
 GO_ITEM('TWO.CF359_GROUP');
 ELSIF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF361_GROUP',VISIBLE) = 'TRUE' THEN 
 GO_ITEM('TWO.CF361_GROUP');
 END IF;
END IF;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
BEGIN
 DECLARE
 CNT NUMBER;
 ALERT_BUTTON NUMBER;
 BEGIN
IF :TWO.SERIAL IS NOT NULL THEN 
 SELECT COUNT(*) INTO CNT FROM
 FIL00_COMPONENTS 
 WHERE AC_TYPE = :GLOBAL.AC_TYPE
 AND WUC = :TWO.WUC
 AND SERIAL = :TWO.SERIAL;

 IF CNT = 0 THEN
 IF :GLOBAL.AC_TYPE = '177' THEN
 SET_ALERT_PROPERTY('WARNING_ALERT',ALERT_MESSAGE_TEXT,'No component data record exists for this Ref Des/Serial combination. Create a new Component Data Record?');
 else
 SET_ALERT_PROPERTY('WARNING_ALERT',ALERT_MESSAGE_TEXT,'No component data record exists for this WUC/Serial combination. Create a new Component Data Record?');
 end if; 
 ALERT_BUTTON := SHOW_ALERT('WARNING_ALERT');
 IF ALERT_BUTTON = ALERT_BUTTON1 THEN
 :GLOBAL.NSN := '';
 :GLOBAL.WUC := :TWO.WUC;
 :GLOBAL.SERIAL := :TWO.SERIAL;
 IF Get_Item_property('TWO.CF358_GROUP',visible) = 'TRUE' THEN
 :GLOBAL.SCREEN_TITLE := 'CF358 * Item History Record';
 ELSE 
 :GLOBAL.SCREEN_TITLE := 'CF359 * Major Assembly History Record';
 END IF;
 CALL_FORM('S358'||:GLOBAL.L);
 :GLOBAL.WUC := NULL;
 :GLOBAL.SERIAL := NULL;
 ELSE
 :TWO.SERIAL := NULL;
 END IF;
 END IF;
END IF;
 END;
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 SELECTION VARCHAR2(1);
 GRP_NAME VARCHAR2(20);
 SCREEN2CALL VARCHAR2(20);
 AREPT VARCHAR2(20);
 QUERY_ONLY_FLAG NUMBER;
 NO_ACCESS_FLAG NUMBER;
 ALERT_BUTTON NUMBER;
 w_con_str VARCHAR2(50) := GET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY(CONNECT_STRING);
BEGIN
-- Jan 06, 2021, O.Shabanov >>> Code revision for validation of 'NOTE_ALERT'. <<<
 IF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF357_GROUP',VISIBLE) = 'TRUE' THEN
 GRP_NAME := 'CF357_GROUP';
 :GLOBAL.SCREEN_TITLE := 'CF357 - '||
 GET_RADIO_BUTTON_PROPERTY('CF357_GROUP',:TWO.CF357_GROUP,LABEL);
 ELSIF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF358_GROUP',VISIBLE) = 'TRUE' THEN
 GRP_NAME := 'CF358_GROUP';
 :GLOBAL.SCREEN_TITLE := 'CF358 - '||
 GET_RADIO_BUTTON_PROPERTY('CF358_GROUP',:TWO.CF358_GROUP,LABEL);
 ELSIF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF359_GROUP',VISIBLE) = 'TRUE' THEN
 GRP_NAME := 'CF359_GROUP';
 :GLOBAL.SCREEN_TITLE := 'CF359 - '||
 GET_RADIO_BUTTON_PROPERTY('CF359_GROUP',:TWO.CF359_GROUP,LABEL);
 ELSIF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF361_GROUP',VISIBLE) = 'TRUE' THEN
 GRP_NAME := 'CF361_GROUP';
 :GLOBAL.SCREEN_TITLE := 'CF361 - '||
 GET_RADIO_BUTTON_PROPERTY('CF361_GROUP',:TWO.CF361_GROUP,LABEL);
 END IF;

 :GLOBAL.SCREEN_TITLE := UPPER(:GLOBAL.SCREEN_TITLE);

 SELECT DECODE(GRP_NAME,
 'CF357_GROUP','R3579A',
 'CF358_GROUP','R358A',
 'CF359_GROUP','R3579A',
 'CF361_GROUP','R361A','') INTO AREPT FROM DUAL;

 SELECTION := NAME_IN('TWO.'||GRP_NAME);
-- determine which screen should be called based on the radio-button selected & the current group.
-- These are the choices for the CF357 and CF359.
 IF GRP_NAME IN ('CF357_GROUP','CF359_GROUP') THEN
 SELECT DECODE(SELECTION, 
 'A','S358',
 'B','SSCHD',
 'C','STRANS',
 'D','SVERIF',
 'E','SMODSI',
 'F','SMODSI',
 'G','SMODSI',
 'H','SCOMME',
 'I','SCOMME',
 'J','SCOMME',
 'K',AREPT,
 'L','ALL',
 'NONE') INTO SCREEN2CALL FROM DUAL; 
-- These are the choices for the CF358
 ELSIF GRP_NAME = 'CF358_GROUP' THEN
 SELECT DECODE(SELECTION, 
 'A','S358',
 'B','SCOMME',
 'C','SMODSI',
 'D','SMODSI',
 'E',AREPT,
 'F','ALL',
 'NONE') INTO SCREEN2CALL FROM DUAL;
-- These are the choices for the CF361
 ELSIF GRP_NAME = 'CF361_GROUP' THEN
-- Jan 14, 2011, PL. SCR# 2155. Call s361_3 screen. 
 SELECT DECODE(SELECTION, 
 'A','S358',
 'B','S361_3',
 'C','SSCHD',
 'D','STRANS',
 'E','SVERIF',
 'F','SMODSI',
 'G','SMODSI',
 'H','SMODSI',
 'I','R361IX',
 'J','SCOMME',
 'K','SCOMME',
 'L','SCOMME',
 'M',AREPT,
 'N','ALL',
 'NONE') INTO SCREEN2CALL FROM DUAL;
 END IF;
--See if the option selected should be disallowed for this user
-- Dec 20, 2010, PL. SCR# 3351. Check for role_name or specific user.
 SELECT COUNT(*) INTO NO_ACCESS_FLAG FROM TBL43_ROLE_MENU_PERMISSIONS
 WHERE (INSTR(:GLOBAL.ROLE_LIST, ROLE_NAME) > 0
 OR ROLE_NAME = :GLOBAL.USER
 OR (SUBSTR(:GLOBAL.USER,1,3) = SUBSTR(ROLE_NAME,1,3) AND w_con_str = 'REPOSITORY')
 OR (INSTR(:GLOBAL.ROLE_LIST,'FSR') > 0 AND ROLE_NAME = 'VIEWING')
 )
 AND RADIO_GROUP = GRP_NAME
 AND RADIO_LETTER = SELECTION
 AND PERMISSION = 'C';

 IF NO_ACCESS_FLAG > 0 THEN
 SET_ALERT_PROPERTY('STOP_ALERT',ALERT_MESSAGE_TEXT,
 'This menu option is not accessible to this account. '||
 'Please make another selection.'); 
 SET_ALERT_PROPERTY('STOP_ALERT',TITLE, 'No Access');
 ALERT_BUTTON := SHOW_ALERT('STOP_ALERT');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF;
-- See if the option selected should be called in QUERY_ONLY mode for this user
-- Dec 16, 2010, PL. SCR# 3351. Check for role_name or specific user.
 SELECT COUNT(*) INTO QUERY_ONLY_FLAG FROM TBL43_ROLE_MENU_PERMISSIONS
 WHERE (INSTR(:GLOBAL.ROLE_LIST, ROLE_NAME) > 0
 OR ROLE_NAME = :GLOBAL.USER
 OR (SUBSTR(:GLOBAL.USER,1,3) = SUBSTR(ROLE_NAME,1,3) AND w_con_str = 'REPOSITORY')
 OR (INSTR(:GLOBAL.ROLE_LIST,'FSR') > 0 AND ROLE_NAME = 'VIEWING')
 )
 AND RADIO_GROUP = GRP_NAME
 AND RADIO_LETTER = SELECTION
 AND PERMISSION = 'B';
-- This section is to deal with those radio-button items that don't have an associated screen to call.
-- They call reports directly instead. Check the first letter of the SCREEN2CALL variable. If it is "R", this
-- should be a report rather than a screen. 
------------------------------------------------------------------
--MESSAGE('GRP:'||GRP_NAME||' SEL:'||SELECTION||SCREEN2CALL||' '||:GLOBAL.SCREEN_TITLE);
--PAUSE;
--MESSAGE(':ROLE_LIST == '||:GLOBAL.ROLE_LIST||'...:USER == '||:GLOBAL.USER||'...w_con_str == '||w_con_str||'...GRP_NAME == '||GRP_NAME||'...SELECTION == '||SELECTION, ACKNOWLEDGE);
 IF SUBSTR(SCREEN2CALL, 1,1) = 'R' THEN
 RUN_REPORT(SCREEN2CALL,'P', :TWO.WUC, :TWO.SERIAL);
------------------------------------------------------------------
 ELSE
-- Run all the reports for the selected group
 IF SCREEN2CALL = 'ALL' THEN
 RUN_REPORT(SUBSTR(GRP_NAME, 1, 5),'P', :TWO.WUC, :TWO.SERIAL);
 ELSE
-- Call the appropriate screen for the radio-button chosen
 :GLOBAL.WUC := :TWO.WUC;
 :GLOBAL.SERIAL := :TWO.SERIAL;
 :GLOBAL.NSN := '';

 IF QUERY_ONLY_FLAG = 0 THEN
 CALL_FORM(SCREEN2CALL||:GLOBAL.L); -- Normal call
 ELSE
 SET_ALERT_PROPERTY('NOTE_ALERT',ALERT_MESSAGE_TEXT,
 'Please note: '||
 'This account may only access this screen in READ ONLY mode. '||
 'Press OK to continue.'); 
 SET_ALERT_PROPERTY('NOTE_ALERT',TITLE, 'Limited Access Warning');
 ALERT_BUTTON := SHOW_ALERT('NOTE_ALERT');
 CALL_FORM(SCREEN2CALL||:GLOBAL.L, no_hide, no_replace, query_only); -- Query Only
 END IF;
-- ALWAYS clear GLOBAL SCREEN_TITLE, GLOBAL.WUC and GLOBAL.SERIAL after returning from the called screen!!
 :GLOBAL.WUC := '';
 :GLOBAL.SERIAL := '';
 :GLOBAL.SCREEN_TITLE := '';
 END IF;
 END IF;
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
if NAME_IN(:SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK||'.OPTION') NOT BETWEEN 'A' AND NAME_IN('CHANGE_ACUIC.MAX_OPT_'||:SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK)
 OR NAME_IN(:SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK||'.OPTION') IS NULL
 OR GET_ITEM_PROPERTY(:SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK||'.OPT'||TO_CHAR(ASCII(NAME_IN(:SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK||'.OPTION'))-64),ENABLED) = 'FALSE' THEN
 COPY('',:SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK||'.OPTION');
 COPY('A',:SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK||'.CHOICE');
 else
 COPY(NAME_IN(:SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK||'.OPTION'),:SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK||'.CHOICE');
 COPY('',:SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK||'.OPTION');
 POINT;

 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF357_GROUP',VISIBLE, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF358_GROUP',VISIBLE, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF359_GROUP',VISIBLE, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF361_GROUP',VISIBLE, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TWO.GO',ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 :TWO.WUC := NULL;
 :TWO.SERIAL := NULL;
 :two.instruct := '';
 :two.title := '';
 IF :TWO.CHOICE = 'A' THEN
 select decode(substr(:global.l,2,1), 'E','Engine History Record','F','Historique des Moteurs') into :two.title from dual;
 ELSIF :TWO.CHOICE = 'B' THEN
 select decode(substr(:global.l,2,1), 'E','Item History Record','F','Historique des Articles') into :two.title from dual;
 ELSIF :TWO.CHOICE = 'C' THEN
 select decode(substr(:global.l,2,1), 'E','Maj. Assy. History Record','F','Historique d''Ens. Princip.') into :two.title from dual;
 ELSIF :TWO.CHOICE = 'D' THEN
 select decode(substr(:global.l,2,1), 'E','APU History Record','F','Historique APU') into :two.title from dual;
 END IF;

 IF :TWO.CHOICE = 'A' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF357_GROUP',VISIBLE, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF357_GROUP',ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 ELSIF :TWO.CHOICE = 'B' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF358_GROUP',VISIBLE, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF358_GROUP',ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 ELSIF :TWO.CHOICE = 'C' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF359_GROUP',VISIBLE, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF359_GROUP',ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 ELSIF :TWO.CHOICE = 'D' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF361_GROUP',VISIBLE, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF361_GROUP',ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 ELSE
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF357_GROUP',VISIBLE, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF358_GROUP',VISIBLE, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF359_GROUP',VISIBLE, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF361_GROUP',VISIBLE, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TWO.WUC',ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TWO.SERIAL',ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TWO.WUC',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'NORMAL');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TWO.SERIAL',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'NORMAL');
 END IF;

 end if;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-NEW-ITEM-INSTANCE
Trigger.TriggerText:
--<RB, 10-Sep-2007>
--Set the WUC/Ref Des properties of the WUC item (TWO.WUC).
BEGIN

 SET_WUC_REFDES_PROPERTIES

 ,refdes_lov => 'REFDES_357'
 ,refdes_prompt => 'REF DES'
 ,refdes_hint => NULL
 ,wuc_lov => 'WUC_357'
 ,wuc_prompt => 'WUC'
 ,wuc_hint => NULL
 ); 
 
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
BEGIN -- MMAIN_E : Block TWO WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED trigger
 -- Created 2020/09/21 by Ian Hale (Hale Software Inc.)
 -- For S2950070 Work Item 41629: 

 IF :SYSTEM.TRIGGER_ITEM IN (
 'TWO.OPT1', 
 'TWO.OPT2', 
 'TWO.OPT3', 
 'TWO.OPT4',

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 ITEM VARCHAR2(1);
 GRP_NAME VARCHAR2(20);
 SCREEN2CALL VARCHAR2(20);
 AREPT VARCHAR2(20);
 vWUC VARCHAR2(20);
 vSERIAL VARCHAR2(10);

BEGIN
ITEM := NAME_IN(:SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK||'.CF350_GROUP');
vWUC := :GLOBAL.AF_DESIGNATOR;
vSERIAL := :GLOBAL.AC_TYPE||:FIVE.AC_NUMBER;

SELECT DECODE(ITEM, 
 'A','S350SECT_I',
 'B','STRANS',
 'C','SVERIF',
 'D','S350SECT_III',
 'E','SCOMME',
 'F','SCOMME',
 'G','SSCHD',
 'H','ALL',
 'NONE') INTO SCREEN2CALL FROM DUAL;

:GLOBAL.SCREEN_TITLE := UPPER('CF350 - '||GET_RADIO_BUTTON_PROPERTY('CF350_GROUP',:FIVE.CF350_GROUP,LABEL));
 
 IF SCREEN2CALL = 'ALL' THEN
 RUN_REPORT('CF350','P', vWUC, vSERIAL);
 ELSE
 :GLOBAL.WUC := vWUC;
 :GLOBAL.SERIAL := vSERIAL;
 CALL_FORM(SCREEN2CALL||:GLOBAL.L);
 :GLOBAL.WUC := '';
 :GLOBAL.SERIAL := '';
 :GLOBAL.SCREEN_TITLE := '';
 END IF;
 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: VALIDATE_REFDES_ITEM
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
--<RB, 10-Sep-2007>
--Put in custom item validation for ref des items (ac_type = 177) since drill-down LOV will not work with 
--the item's 'Validate from List' property set to Yes.
PROCEDURE VALIDATE_REFDES_ITEM (i_wuc_item IN varchar2)
IS
 TYPE cursor_var_type IS REF CURSOR;
 
 pti_cursor cursor_var_type;
 alert_num PLS_INTEGER;
 invalid_item_err_msg VARCHAR2(150);
 rec_indicator VARCHAR2(1);
 
 e_no_record_found EXCEPTION;
 
BEGIN

 invalid_item_err_msg := 'Invalid Ref Des. Press F9 to display a list of valid values.';
 OPEN pti_cursor FOR
 SELECT 'X'
 FROM tbl48_ref_des
 WHERE ac_type = :GLOBAL.ac_type
 AND DECODE(is_numeric(system_id),'TRUE',system_id,parent_id||system_id) LIKE i_wuc_item;
 
 FETCH pti_cursor INTO rec_indicator;
 
 IF pti_cursor%NOTFOUND THEN
 RAISE e_no_record_found;
 END IF; 
 
EXCEPTION
 WHEN e_no_record_found then
 MESSAGE(invalid_item_err_msg);
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
END;
--</RB>

ProgramUnit.Name: SET_WUC_REFDES_PROPERTIES
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
--Procedure added to change LOV and Prompt of WUC/Ref_Des items depending on aircraft type.
--RB, 2007-August
PROCEDURE SET_WUC_REFDES_PROPERTIES 
 (itm_name VARCHAR2,
 refdes_lov VARCHAR2,
 refdes_prompt VARCHAR2,
 refdes_hint VARCHAR2,
 wuc_lov VARCHAR2,
 wuc_prompt VARCHAR2,
 wuc_hint VARCHAR2)
IS
BEGIN
 --LOV and Prompt change depending on aircraft.
 IF :GLOBAL.AC_TYPE ='177' then
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(itm_name, PROMPT_TEXT, refdes_prompt);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(itm_name, HINT_TEXT ,refdes_hint); 
 IF refdes_lov IS NOT NULL THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(itm_name, LOV_NAME, refdes_lov);
 END IF; 
 ELSE
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(itm_name, PROMPT_TEXT, wuc_prompt);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(itm_name, HINT_TEXT, wuc_hint);
 IF wuc_lov IS NOT NULL THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(itm_name, LOV_NAME, wuc_lov);
 END IF; 
 END IF;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: POINT
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE POINT IS
 X NUMBER;
 Y NUMBER;
BEGIN

 -- Get ASCII code of highest button (OPTx) for the current block. 
 Y := ASCII(NAME_IN('CHANGE_ACUIC.MAX_OPT_'||:SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK));

 -- Loop through and set OPTx value to null and Vis Att. to 'NORMAL' for each item
 FOR X IN 65..Y LOOP
 -- Do not set attribute when menu item is disabled.
 IF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY((:SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK || '.OPT' || CHR(X)), VISIBLE) = 'TRUE' THEN
 COPY('',:SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK||'.OPT'||CHR(X));
 DISPLAY_ITEM(:SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK||'.OPT'||CHR(X),'normal');
 END IF;
 
 END LOOP;
 -- Call SET_OPT procedure - Pass value of "choice" to procedure. 
 -- (Procedure sets selected option color)
 SET_OPT(NAME_IN(:SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK||'.CHOICE'));

END;

ProgramUnit.Name: SET_DEFAULTS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE SET_DEFAULTS IS

 CURSOR AF_WUC IS
 SELECT WUC FROM TBL02_ECIR
 WHERE AC_TYPE = :GLOBAL.AC_TYPE
 AND TYPE = 'A';
 CURSOR AF_REFDES IS
 SELECT parent_id||system_id FROM TBL48_REF_DES
 WHERE AC_TYPE = :GLOBAL.AC_TYPE
 AND TYPE = 'A';

BEGIN

 IF :CHANGE_ACUIC.AC_TYPE IS NOT NULL THEN
 :GLOBAL.AC_TYPE := :CHANGE_ACUIC.AC_TYPE;
 :GLOBAL.AC_TYPE := :CHANGE_ACUIC.AC_TYPE;
 END IF;

 IF :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIXER_UNIT IS NOT NULL THEN
 :ONE.FIXER_UNIT := :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIXER_UNIT;
 :GLOBAL.FIXER := :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIXER_UNIT;
 :GLOBAL.FIXER_UNIT := :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIXER_UNIT;
 END IF;

 IF :GLOBAL.AC_TYPE != '177' THEN
 OPEN AF_WUC;
 FETCH AF_WUC INTO :GLOBAL.AF_DESIGNATOR;
 CLOSE AF_WUC;
 ELSE
 OPEN AF_REFDES;
 FETCH AF_REFDES INTO :GLOBAL.AF_DESIGNATOR;
 CLOSE AF_REFDES;
 END IF; 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: DISP_RADIO_GROUPS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE disp_radio_groups (vCHOICE IN VARCHAR, vTITLE IN VARCHAR) IS
BEGIN
GO_ITEM('TWO.OPTION');
:two.choice := vCHOICE;
:two.option := vCHOICE;
POINT;

:TWO.WUC := NULL;
:TWO.SERIAL := NULL;
:two.title := vTITLE;
:two.instruct := '';
--:two.instruct2 := '';
SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF358_GROUP',VISIBLE, PROPERTY_FALSE);
SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF359_GROUP',VISIBLE, PROPERTY_FALSE);
SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF361_GROUP',VISIBLE, PROPERTY_FALSE);
SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF357_GROUP',VISIBLE, PROPERTY_FALSE);
SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TWO.GO',ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);

IF :TWO.CHOICE = 'A' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF357_GROUP',VISIBLE, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF357_GROUP',ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
ELSIF :TWO.CHOICE = 'B' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF358_GROUP',VISIBLE, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF358_GROUP',ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
ELSIF :TWO.CHOICE = 'C' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF359_GROUP',VISIBLE, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF359_GROUP',ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
ELSIF :TWO.CHOICE = 'D' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF361_GROUP',VISIBLE, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF361_GROUP',ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
ELSE
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF357_GROUP',VISIBLE, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF358_GROUP',VISIBLE, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF359_GROUP',VISIBLE, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF361_GROUP',VISIBLE, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TWO.WUC',ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TWO.SERIAL',ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TWO.WUC',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'NORMAL');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TWO.SERIAL',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'NORMAL');
END IF;

IF :TWO.CHOICE IN ('A','B','C','D') THEN
-- GO_ITEM('TWO.CHOICE');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TWO.WUC',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'WHITE');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TWO.SERIAL',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'WHITE');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TWO.WUC',ENABLED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TWO.SERIAL',ENABLED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
-- SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TWO.GO',ENABLED, PROPERTY_TRUE);

 GO_ITEM('TWO.WUC');
ELSE
 :two.instruct := '';
-- :two.instruct2 := '';

 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TWO.WUC',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'NORMAL');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TWO.SERIAL',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'NORMAL');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TWO.WUC',ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TWO.SERIAL',ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TWO.GO',ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);

END IF;

END;

ProgramUnit.Name: SET_OPT
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE set_opt (OPTLET_IN IN VARCHAR)IS
 MAX_OPT VARCHAR2(1);
 OPTLET VARCHAR2(1);
BEGIN

 if OPTLET_IN is null then 
 OPTLET := 'A';
 else
 OPTLET := OPTLET_IN;
 end if;

 MAX_OPT := NAME_IN('CHANGE_ACUIC.MAX_OPT_'||:SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK);

 -- Set the chosen option item to red 
 DISPLAY_ITEM(:SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK||'.OPT'||OPTLET,'BG_COLOR');

 -- Set the previous and next items to normal
 IF OPTLET = 'A' THEN
 DISPLAY_ITEM(:SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK||'.OPT'||MAX_OPT,'normal');
 ELSE
 DISPLAY_ITEM(:SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK||'.OPT'||CHR(ASCII(OPTLET)-1),'normal');
 END IF;
 IF OPTLET = MAX_OPT THEN
 DISPLAY_ITEM(:SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK||'.OPTA','normal');
 ELSE
 DISPLAY_ITEM(:SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK||'.OPT'||CHR(ASCII(OPTLET)+1),'normal');
 END IF;

END;

ProgramUnit.Name: DO_DOWN
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE do_down IS
BEGIN
DECLARE
 MAX_OPT VARCHAR2(1) := NAME_IN('CHANGE_ACUIC.MAX_OPT_'||:SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK);
 CUR_VAL VARCHAR2(1);
 NEW_VAL VARCHAR2(1);
BEGIN
<<START_LOOP>>
 CUR_VAL := NAME_IN(:SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK||'.CHOICE');
 NEW_VAL := CHR(ASCII(CUR_VAL)+1);
 IF NEW_VAL > MAX_OPT THEN
 NEW_VAL := 'A';
 END IF;

 COPY(NEW_VAL, :SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK||'.CHOICE');
-- Enable & disable the WUC & Serial fields depending on the choice
 IF :SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK = 'TWO' THEN
 GO_ITEM('TWO.OPTION');
 SET_BLK_TWO_FIELDS;
 END IF;
 
-- If menu item is disabled, go to next item.
 IF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY(:SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK||'.OPT'||TO_CHAR(ASCII(NEW_VAL)-64),ENABLED) = 'FALSE' THEN
 GOTO START_LOOP;
 END IF;
 go_item(:SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK||'.OPTION');
 POINT ;
END; 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: DO_UP
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE do_up IS
BEGIN
DECLARE
 MAX_OPT VARCHAR2(1) := NAME_IN('CHANGE_ACUIC.MAX_OPT_'||:SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK);
 CUR_VAL VARCHAR2(1);
 NEW_VAL VARCHAR2(1);
BEGIN
<<START_LOOP>>
 CUR_VAL := NAME_IN(:SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK||'.CHOICE');
 NEW_VAL := CHR(ASCII(CUR_VAL)-1);
 IF NEW_VAL < 'A' THEN
 NEW_VAL := MAX_OPT;
 END IF;
 COPY(NEW_VAL, :SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK||'.CHOICE');
-- Enable & disable the WUC & Serial fields depending on the choice
 IF :SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK = 'TWO' THEN
 GO_ITEM('TWO.OPTION');
 SET_BLK_TWO_FIELDS;
 END IF;

-- If menu item is disabled, go to next item.
 IF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY(:SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK||'.OPT'||TO_CHAR(ASCII(NEW_VAL)-64),ENABLED) = 'FALSE' THEN
 GOTO START_LOOP;
 END IF;
 go_item(:SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK||'.OPTION');
 POINT ;
END; 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: SET_BLK_TWO_FIELDS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE SET_BLK_TWO_FIELDS IS
BEGIN
 IF :TWO.CHOICE IN ('A','B','C','D') THEN
 :TWO.WUC := NULL;
 :TWO.SERIAL := NULL;
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TWO.GO',ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TWO.WUC', ENABLED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TWO.SERIAL', ENABLED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TWO.WUC', VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'WHITE');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TWO.SERIAL', VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'WHITE');
 IF :TWO.CHOICE = 'A' THEN
 DISP_RADIO_GROUPS('A', 'Engine History Record');
 ELSIF :TWO.CHOICE = 'B' THEN
 DISP_RADIO_GROUPS('B', 'Item History Record');
 ELSIF :TWO.CHOICE = 'C' THEN
 DISP_RADIO_GROUPS('C', 'Maj. Assy. History Record');
 ELSIF :TWO.CHOICE = 'D' THEN
 DISP_RADIO_GROUPS('D', 'APU History Record');
 END IF;
 ELSE
 :TWO.TITLE := ''; 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TWO.GO',ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TWO.WUC', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TWO.SERIAL', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TWO.WUC', VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'NORMAL');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TWO.SERIAL', VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'NORMAL');
 
 -- Modified 2020/09/24 by Ian Hale (Hale Software Inc.)
 -- For S2950070, Work Item 43532: 
 -- Hide the radio buttons
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF358_GROUP',VISIBLE, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF359_GROUP',VISIBLE, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF361_GROUP',VISIBLE, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF357_GROUP',VISIBLE, PROPERTY_FALSE);

 END IF;

END;

ProgramUnit.Name: SET_AC_TYPE_SPECIFICS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE SET_AC_TYPE_SPECIFICS IS
BEGIN
IF :GLOBAL.LANG = 'ENG' THEN
 if :global.ac_type = '177' then
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('ONE.OPT3',PROMPT_TEXT, 'TCTOs Due');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('ONE.OPT7',PROMPT_TEXT, 'TCTO Status (Bingo Sheet)');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('ONE.OPT8',PROMPT_TEXT, 'TCTO Report');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('FOUR.OPT2',PROMPT_TEXT, 'TCTOs');
 else
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('ONE.OPT3',PROMPT_TEXT, 'Mods/SIs Due');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('ONE.OPT7',PROMPT_TEXT, 'Mod/SI Status (Bingo Sheet)');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('ONE.OPT8',PROMPT_TEXT, 'Mod/SI Report');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('FOUR.OPT2',PROMPT_TEXT, 'Modifications and Special Inspections');
 end if;
ELSE
 if :global.ac_type = '177' then
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('ONE.OPT3',PROMPT_TEXT, 'TCTOs Dues');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('ONE.OPT7',PROMPT_TEXT, 'État TCTO (Bingo Sheet)');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('ONE.OPT8',PROMPT_TEXT, 'TCTO Rapport');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('FOUR.OPT2',PROMPT_TEXT, 'TCTOs');
 else
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('ONE.OPT3',PROMPT_TEXT, 'Mod/IS Dues');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('ONE.OPT7',PROMPT_TEXT, 'État Mod/IS (Bingo Sheet)');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('ONE.OPT8',PROMPT_TEXT, 'Mod/IS Rapport');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('FOUR.OPT2',PROMPT_TEXT, 'Modifications et Inspections Special');
 end if;
END IF;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: VAL_OPTION_FIELD
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE val_option_field IS
BEGIN
 if NAME_IN(:SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK||'.OPTION') NOT BETWEEN 'A' AND NAME_IN('CHANGE_ACUIC.MAX_OPT_'||:SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK)
 OR NAME_IN(:SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK||'.OPTION') IS NULL
 OR GET_ITEM_PROPERTY(:SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK||'.OPT'||TO_CHAR(ASCII(NAME_IN(:SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK||'.OPTION'))-64),ENABLED) = 'FALSE' THEN
 COPY('',:SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK||'.OPTION');
 -- Modified 2020/10/07 by Ian Hale (Hale Software Inc.)
 -- For S2950070, Work Item 43532:
 -- Use first enabled item in the block, 
 -- instead of character A as default value.
 COPY(NAME_IN('CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_'||:SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK),:SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK||'.CHOICE');
 else
 COPY(NAME_IN(:SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK||'.OPTION'),:SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK||'.CHOICE');
 COPY('',:SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK||'.OPTION');
 POINT;
 -- Added 2020/09/01 by Ian Hale (Hale Software Inc.)
 -- For S2950070 Work Item 41629: 
 COPY('',:SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK||'.OPTION');
 end if;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: CHK_AUTH
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE chk_auth (SCREEN IN VARCHAR) IS
-- MMAIN_E form.
/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
/* This is the main procedure that calls the appropriate screen when a button is pressed.
/* When adding a new button, do the following:
/*
/* 1. Update the value of :CHANGE_ACUIC.MAX_OPT<block> in WHEN-NEW-FORM-INSTANCE 
/* to reflect the highest button letter in the block.
/* 2. Ensure the button has a WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED trigger that calls CHK_AUTH and passes the filename of the
/* called screen, without the '_E' or '_F'. (Check some of the current WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED triggers)
/* 3. Update TBL43_ROLE_MENU_PERMISSIONS table to reflect the appropriate role permissions for the tab/item:
/* A - Full access
/* B - Query_Only access
/* C - No access
/*-------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
 ALERT_BUTTON NUMBER;
 BLK VARCHAR2(10);
 OPT VARCHAR2(2);
 PERMIT VARCHAR2(1);

 -- Added 2020/08/27 by Ian Hale (Hale Software Inc.)
 -- For S2950070, Work Item 43532: 
 PERMIT_ROLE VARCHAR2(1);
 PERMIT_USER VARCHAR2(1);
 PERMIT_VIEW VARCHAR2(1);

 role_desc varchar2(30);
 TAB VARCHAR2(10);

 -- Modified 2020/08/27 by Ian Hale (Hale Software Inc.)
 -- For S2950070, Work Item 43532: 
 -- Split Query into 3 separate ones to get individual permissions.
 -- A specified User permission overrides any Role or Repositiory permission.
 -- The REPOSITORY query is no longer needed 
 -- as it should use the same rules as all the other databases.
 CURSOR PERM_ROLE_CUR IS
 SELECT PERMISSION 
 FROM TBL43_ROLE_MENU_PERMISSIONS
 WHERE INSTR(:GLOBAL.ROLE_LIST, ROLE_NAME) > 0 
 AND MENU_TAB = TAB
 AND MENU_OPTION = OPT;

 CURSOR PERM_USER_CUR IS
 SELECT PERMISSION 
 FROM TBL43_ROLE_MENU_PERMISSIONS
 WHERE ROLE_NAME = :GLOBAL.USER 
 AND MENU_TAB = TAB
 AND MENU_OPTION = OPT;
 
 CURSOR PERM_VIEW_CUR IS
 SELECT PERMISSION 
 FROM TBL43_ROLE_MENU_PERMISSIONS
 WHERE (INSTR(:GLOBAL.ROLE_LIST,'FSR') > 0 AND 
 ROLE_NAME = 'VIEWING') 
 AND MENU_TAB = TAB
 AND MENU_OPTION = OPT;

BEGIN

 BLK := :SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK;
 OPT := CHR(SUBSTR(:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_ITEM, LENGTH(BLK)+5,2)+64); 

 SELECT DECODE(BLK,
 'ONE','AC_REL',
 'ONEA','AC_REL2',
 'TWO','COMP_REL',
 'THREE','MAINT',
 'FOUR','AMCRO') 
 INTO TAB FROM DUAL;

 SELECT DECODE(:GLOBAL.ROLE_LIST, 
 'CONTROL_RECORDS','AMCRO',
 'SUPERVISING','Supervisor',
 'TECHNICIAN','Technician',
 'VIEWING','Read Only',
 'SERVICING','Servicing',
 'IMPOUNDING','Impound',
 'ADAM_ADMINISTRATOR','Administrator',
 'FSR','Read Only',
 'Unidentified') 
 INTO ROLE_DESC FROM DUAL;

 -- Modified 2020/09/21 by Ian Hale (Hale Software Inc.)
 -- For S2950070, Work Item 43532: 
 -- Check for a USER permission
 PERMIT := NULL;
 OPEN PERM_USER_CUR;
 FETCH PERM_USER_CUR INTO PERMIT_USER;
 IF PERM_USER_CUR%FOUND THEN
 PERMIT := PERMIT_USER;
 CLOSE PERM_USER_CUR;
 ELSE
 -- Check the ROLE permission for the user.
 CLOSE PERM_USER_CUR;

 OPEN PERM_ROLE_CUR;
 FETCH PERM_ROLE_CUR INTO PERMIT_ROLE; 
 IF PERM_ROLE_CUR%FOUND THEN
 PERMIT := PERMIT_ROLE;
 END IF;
 CLOSE PERM_ROLE_CUR;
 END IF;

 -- Give FSR role the ability to update the S335. (FSR checkbox)
 IF INSTR(:GLOBAL.ROLE_LIST, 'FSR')> 0 THEN
 IF SCREEN LIKE 'S33577%' THEN
 PERMIT := 'A';
 ELSE
 OPEN PERM_VIEW_CUR;
 FETCH PERM_VIEW_CUR INTO PERMIT_VIEW; 
 CLOSE PERM_VIEW_CUR;
 IF PERMIT_VIEW IS NOT NULL THEN
 PERMIT := PERMIT_VIEW;
 END IF;
 END IF; -- USER
 END IF; -- FSR

 :GLOBAL.SCREEN_TITLE := UPPER(GET_ITEM_PROPERTY(:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_ITEM, PROMPT_TEXT));
 COPY(get_item_property(:system.trigger_item,LABEL),BLK||'.CHOICE');

 POINT;

 IF PERMIT = 'A' THEN -- Option allowed - No restrictions
 :GLOBAL.QUERY_ONLY := 'N';
 CALL_FORM(SCREEN);
 ELSIF PERMIT = 'B' THEN -- Option allowed but in QUERY_ONLY mode only
 SET_ALERT_PROPERTY('NOTE_ALERT',ALERT_MESSAGE_TEXT,'Please note: '||ROLE_DESC||' accounts may only access this screen in READ ONLY mode. Press OK to continue.'); 
 SET_ALERT_PROPERTY('NOTE_ALERT',TITLE, 'Limited Access Warning');
 ALERT_BUTTON := SHOW_ALERT('NOTE_ALERT');
 :GLOBAL.QUERY_ONLY := 'Y';
 CALL_FORM(SCREEN, no_hide, no_replace, query_only);
 ELSIF PERMIT = 'C' THEN -- Option not allowed
 SET_ALERT_PROPERTY('STOP_ALERT',ALERT_MESSAGE_TEXT,'This menu option is not accessible to '||ROLE_DESC||' accounts. Please make another selection.'); 
 SET_ALERT_PROPERTY('STOP_ALERT',TITLE, 'No Access');
 ALERT_BUTTON := SHOW_ALERT('STOP_ALERT');
 ELSE
 PERMIT := 'A'; -- If option doesn't exist in TBL43, treat the same as 'A'.
 :GLOBAL.QUERY_ONLY := 'N';
 CALL_FORM(SCREEN);
 END IF;

 :GLOBAL.SCREEN_TITLE := NULL; 

END;

ProgramUnit.Name: RUN_REPORT
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE RUN_REPORT (pSOURCE Varchar2, pMODE Varchar2, pWUC Varchar2, pSERIAL Varchar2) IS

 LIST_ID paramlist;
 V_SYNCHRONOUS number(20);
 Batch_Runtime number(20);
 ALERT_BUTTON NUMBER;
 ALERT_NAME VARCHAR2(30);
 print_dest varchar2(10):= 'PRINTER'; 
-- Added by Scott Morrow - Jun 2002 - SCR 398
-- Add cursor to loop through each life indicator (print one page for each)
-- when printing Section II.
 CURSOR LI IS
 SELECT A.LIFE_INDICATOR, B.DESCRIPTION FROM FIL00_COMPONENTS A, TBL09_LIFE_INDICATOR B
 WHERE 
 A.WUC = pWUC AND
 A.SERIAL = pSERIAL AND
 A.AC_TYPE = :GLOBAL.AC_TYPE AND
 B.CODE = A.LIFE_INDICATOR; 
 
begin
 
 List_id := get_parameter_list('REPORT_PARAMS'); 
 if not id_null(LIST_ID) then
 destroy_parameter_list(LIST_ID);
 end if;
 LIST_ID := create_parameter_list('REPORT_PARAMS');

-- Create initial standard default parameters
 add_parameter(LIST_ID,'P_AC_TYPE', text_parameter, :GLOBAL.AC_TYPE);
 add_parameter(LIST_ID, 'P_WUC', text_parameter, pWUC);
 add_parameter(LIST_ID,'P_SERIAL', text_parameter, pSERIAL);
 Add_Parameter (List_Id, 'P_USER_ROLE', TEXT_PARAMETER, :GLOBAL.ROLE_LIST);
 Add_Parameter (List_Id, 'P_ROLE_PW', TEXT_PARAMETER, :GLOBAL.ROLE_PW);

 -- Added May 26, 2010, Hale Software Inc. - IHALE. SCR #3201
 -- Setup for option to include history records on the report.
 -- Modified June 9, 2010, Hale Software Inc. - IHALE. SCR #3201
 -- Changed Alert names to be generic and 
 -- to display common title and question.
 -- Modified May 5, 2014 - T Russell. SCR #3386. Included 'R361A' into list of reports to exclude history records.
 IF pSOURCE IN ('R3579A', 'R361A') THEN
 ALERT_NAME := 'RPT_OPTIONS_B1_ALERT';
 ELSIF pSOURCE IN ('R358A') THEN
 ALERT_NAME := 'RPT_OPTIONS_B2_ALERT';
 ELSE
 ALERT_NAME := NULL;
 END IF;

 -- Added Sept 1, 2009, Hale Software Inc. - IHALE. SCR #1311
 -- Modified May 26, 2010, Hale Software Inc. - IHALE. SCR #3201
 -- Added R358A report and made routine generic,
 -- so multiple and future reports can use this report parameter.
 IF ALERT_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN
 ALERT_BUTTON := SHOW_ALERT(ALERT_NAME);
 IF ALERT_BUTTON = ALERT_BUTTON1 THEN
 add_parameter(LIST_ID,'P_SHOW_HISTORY', text_parameter, 'Y');
 ELSIF ALERT_BUTTON = ALERT_BUTTON2 THEN
 add_parameter(LIST_ID,'P_SHOW_HISTORY', text_parameter, 'N');
 ELSE
 RETURN;
 END IF;
 END IF;

 add_parameter(list_id,'PARAMFORM',text_parameter,'NO');
 add_parameter(LIST_ID,'P_FIXER_UNIT', text_parameter, :GLOBAL.FIXER);
 
 V_SYNCHRONOUS := asynchronous;
 Batch_Runtime := RUNTIME; 
 print_dest := 'PRINTER';

-- If we chose one of the single reports, ask whether to print to the screen or the printer.
 IF SUBSTR(pSOURCE,1,1) = 'R' THEN
 ALERT_BUTTON := SHOW_ALERT('PRINT_DESTINATION_ALERT');
 IF ALERT_BUTTON = ALERT_BUTTON1 THEN
 print_dest := 'SCREEN';
 ELSIF ALERT_BUTTON = ALERT_BUTTON2 THEN
 print_dest := 'PRINTER';
 ELSE
 RETURN;
 END IF;
 END IF;

 add_parameter(LIST_ID,'DESTYPE', text_parameter, print_dest);
 
-- CF361 sections III and IX, R357A/358A/359A
-- Oct 29, 2015, PL. S304177. Added CT114 Weekly Maintenance report.
IF pSOURCE IN ('R361IX','R361A','R3579A','R358A', 'R114MAINT') THEN
 run_product(reports, pSOURCE||'.REP', V_SYNCHRONOUS, batch_runtime,filesystem, LIST_ID) ; 
 destroy_parameter_list(LIST_ID);
-- CF358 (ALL)
ELSIF pSOURCE = 'CF358' THEN
 -- May 08, 2008, PL. SCR# 2651. Replaced R358 with R358_12, R358_3, R358_4, and R358_5.
 run_product(reports, 'R358_12.REP', V_SYNCHRONOUS, BATCH_RUNTIME, filesystem, LIST_ID);
 run_product(reports, 'R358_3.REP', V_SYNCHRONOUS, BATCH_RUNTIME, filesystem, LIST_ID);
 run_product(reports, 'R358_4.REP', V_SYNCHRONOUS, BATCH_RUNTIME, filesystem, LIST_ID);
 run_product(reports, 'R358_5.REP', V_SYNCHRONOUS, BATCH_RUNTIME, filesystem, LIST_ID);
 run_product(reports, 'R358A.REP', V_SYNCHRONOUS, BATCH_RUNTIME, filesystem, LIST_ID);

-- CF350 (ALL)
 ELSIF pSOURCE = 'CF350' THEN
 run_product(reports, 'R350CVR.REP', V_SYNCHRONOUS, BATCH_RUNTIME,filesystem, LIST_ID);
 add_parameter(list_id, 'P_FLAG_350', TEXT_PARAMETER, '1'); 
 run_product(reports, 'R350II.REP', V_SYNCHRONOUS, BATCH_RUNTIME,filesystem, LIST_ID); 
 run_product(reports, 'R350IIA.REP', V_SYNCHRONOUS, BATCH_RUNTIME,filesystem, LIST_ID) ;
 run_product(reports, 'R350III.REP', V_SYNCHRONOUS, BATCH_RUNTIME,filesystem, LIST_ID) ;
 run_product(reports, 'R350IV.REP', V_SYNCHRONOUS, BATCH_RUNTIME,filesystem, LIST_ID) ;
 run_product(reports, 'R350V.REP', V_SYNCHRONOUS, BATCH_RUNTIME,filesystem, LIST_ID);
 run_product(reports, 'R350VI.REP', V_SYNCHRONOUS, batch_runtime,filesystem, LIST_ID) ; 
 destroy_parameter_list(LIST_ID);
-- CF361 (ALL)
 ELSIF pSOURCE = 'CF361' THEN
 run_product(reports, 'R361A.REP', V_SYNCHRONOUS, BATCH_RUNTIME, filesystem, LIST_ID) ;
 run_product(reports, 'R361I.REP', V_SYNCHRONOUS, BATCH_RUNTIME, filesystem, LIST_ID); 
 run_product(reports, 'R361II.REP', V_SYNCHRONOUS, BATCH_RUNTIME, filesystem, LIST_ID);
 run_product(reports, 'R361III.REP', V_SYNCHRONOUS, BATCH_RUNTIME, filesystem, LIST_ID) ;
 run_product(reports, 'R361IV.REP', V_SYNCHRONOUS, BATCH_RUNTIME, filesystem, LIST_ID) ;
 run_product(reports, 'R361V.REP', V_SYNCHRONOUS, BATCH_RUNTIME, filesystem, LIST_ID) ;
 run_product(reports, 'R361VA.REP', V_SYNCHRONOUS, BATCH_RUNTIME, filesystem, LIST_ID) ;
 run_product(reports, 'R361VI.REP', V_SYNCHRONOUS, BATCH_RUNTIME, filesystem, LIST_ID) ; 
 run_product(reports, 'R361VII.REP', V_SYNCHRONOUS, BATCH_RUNTIME, filesystem, LIST_ID) ;
 run_product(reports, 'R361VIII.REP', V_SYNCHRONOUS, BATCH_RUNTIME, filesystem, LIST_ID) ; 
 run_product(reports, 'R361IX.REP', V_SYNCHRONOUS, BATCH_RUNTIME, filesystem, LIST_ID) ;
 run_product(reports, 'R361X.REP', V_SYNCHRONOUS, BATCH_RUNTIME, filesystem, LIST_ID) ;
 run_product(reports, 'R361XI.REP', V_SYNCHRONOUS, BATCH_RUNTIME, filesystem, LIST_ID) ;
 run_product(reports, 'R361XII.REP', V_SYNCHRONOUS, BATCH_RUNTIME, filesystem, LIST_ID) ; 
 ELSE 
-- CF357 and CF359 (ALL)
 run_product(reports, 'R3579CV.REP', V_SYNCHRONOUS, BATCH_RUNTIME,filesystem, LIST_ID);
-- CF357/CF359 Section II prints a page for each Life Indicator
 FOR L_IND IN LI LOOP
 add_parameter(LIST_ID, 'P_LIFE_IND', text_parameter, L_IND.LIFE_INDICATOR);
 add_parameter(LIST_ID, 'P_LIFE_IND_DESC', text_parameter, L_IND.DESCRIPTION);
 run_product(reports, 'R3579II.REP', V_SYNCHRONOUS, BATCH_RUNTIME, filesystem, LIST_ID) ;
 delete_parameter(LIST_ID, 'P_LIFE_IND');
 delete_parameter(LIST_ID, 'P_LIFE_IND_DESC');
 END LOOP;
 run_product(reports, 'R3579III.REP', V_SYNCHRONOUS, BATCH_RUNTIME, filesystem, LIST_ID) ;
 run_product(reports, 'R3579IV.REP', V_SYNCHRONOUS, BATCH_RUNTIME,filesystem, LIST_ID) ;
 --run_product(reports, 'R3579S4.REP', V_SYNCHRONOUS, BATCH_RUNTIME,filesystem, LIST_ID) ; --deprecated
 run_product(reports, 'R3579S4A.REP', V_SYNCHRONOUS, BATCH_RUNTIME,filesystem, LIST_ID) ;
 run_product(reports, 'R3579V.REP', V_SYNCHRONOUS, BATCH_RUNTIME,filesystem, LIST_ID) ;
 run_product(reports, 'R3579VI.REP', V_SYNCHRONOUS, BATCH_RUNTIME,filesystem, LIST_ID) ; 
 run_product(reports, 'R3579VII.REP', V_SYNCHRONOUS, BATCH_RUNTIME,filesystem, LIST_ID) ;
 run_product(reports, 'R3579IX.REP', V_SYNCHRONOUS, BATCH_RUNTIME,filesystem, LIST_ID) ;
 run_product(reports, 'R3579X.REP', V_SYNCHRONOUS, BATCH_RUNTIME,filesystem, LIST_ID) ;
 run_product(reports, 'R3579XI.REP', V_SYNCHRONOUS, BATCH_RUNTIME,filesystem, LIST_ID) ;
 run_product(reports, 'R3579A.REP', V_SYNCHRONOUS, BATCH_RUNTIME,filesystem, LIST_ID) ;
 destroy_parameter_list(LIST_ID);
 END IF;

END;

ProgramUnit.Name: DO_BUTTON_ONE
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE DO_BUTTON_ONE IS
 V_BTN VARCHAR2(30);
BEGIN -- MMAIN_E form.
-- Created 2020/09/21 by Ian Hale (Hale Software Inc.)
-- For S2950070 Work Item 41629: 
-- Moved code from all the individual letter buttons
-- to keep the actions done all in one place.

 V_BTN := :SYSTEM.TRIGGER_ITEM;

 IF V_BTN = 'ONE.OPT1' THEN -- Letter A
-- if :global.ac_type != '172' then
-- CHK_AUTH('RACSTA'||:GLOBAL.L);
-- else
-- CHK_AUTH('RACSTA_172'||:GLOBAL.L);
-- end if;
 if :global.ac_type = '172' then
 CHK_AUTH('RACSTA_172'||:GLOBAL.L);
 else
 CHK_AUTH('RACSTA'||:GLOBAL.L);
 end if;
 ELSIF V_BTN = 'ONE.OPT2' THEN -- Letter B
 CHK_AUTH('SSCHDU'||:GLOBAL.L);
 ELSIF V_BTN = 'ONE.OPT3' THEN -- Letter C
 CHK_AUTH('SMODUE'||:GLOBAL.L);
 ELSIF V_BTN = 'ONE.OPT4' THEN -- Letter D
 CHK_AUTH('SMEFCS'||:GLOBAL.L);
 ELSIF V_BTN = 'ONE.OPT5' THEN -- Letter E
 CHK_AUTH('SAPU'||:GLOBAL.L);
 ELSIF V_BTN = 'ONE.OPT6' THEN -- Letter F
 CHK_AUTH('SODM'||:GLOBAL.L);
 ELSIF V_BTN = 'ONE.OPT7' THEN -- Letter G
 CHK_AUTH('R369'||:GLOBAL.L);
 ELSIF V_BTN = 'ONE.OPT8' THEN -- Letter H
 CHK_AUTH('RMODSI'||:GLOBAL.L);
 ELSIF V_BTN = 'ONE.OPT9' THEN -- Letter I
 CHK_AUTH('RYFR'||:GLOBAL.L);
 ELSIF V_BTN = 'ONE.OPT10' THEN -- Letter J
 CHK_AUTH('RMAUSR'||:GLOBAL.L);
 ELSIF V_BTN = 'ONE.OPT11' THEN -- Letter K
 CHK_AUTH('FUELR'||:GLOBAL.L);
 ELSIF V_BTN = 'ONE.OPT12' THEN -- Letter L
 -- Oct 29, 2015, PL. S304177. 
 -- Allow CT114 users to generate the CT114 Weekly Maintenance report.
 IF :global.ac_type = '130' THEN
 CHK_AUTH('RFLTSUM'||:GLOBAL.L);
 ELSIF :global.ac_type = '114' THEN
 run_report('R114MAINT', 'P', NULL, NULL);
 END IF; 
 ELSIF V_BTN = 'ONE.OPT13' THEN -- Letter M
 CHK_AUTH('RELM'||:GLOBAL.L);
 ELSIF V_BTN = 'ONE.OPT14' THEN -- Letter N
 --CHK_AUTH('RMAINTLOG'||:GLOBAL.L);
 CHK_AUTH('RMAINTSUM'||:GLOBAL.L);
 ELSIF V_BTN = 'ONE.OPT15' THEN -- Letter O
 CHK_AUTH('RMISSDET'||:GLOBAL.L);
 END IF;

END;

ProgramUnit.Name: DO_BUTTON_TWO
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE DO_BUTTON_TWO IS
 V_BTN VARCHAR2(30);
BEGIN -- MMAIN_E form.
-- Created 2020/09/21 by Ian Hale (Hale Software Inc.)
-- For S2950070 Work Item 41629: 
-- Moved code from all the individual letter buttons
-- to keep the actions done all in one place.

 V_BTN := :SYSTEM.TRIGGER_ITEM;

 IF V_BTN = 'TWO.OPT1' THEN -- Letter A
 if :GLOBAL.LANG = 'ENG' then
 DISP_RADIO_GROUPS('A', 'Engine History Record');
 else
 DISP_RADIO_GROUPS('A', 'Fiche Historique de Moteur');
 end if;
 ELSIF V_BTN = 'TWO.OPT2' THEN -- Letter B
 if :GLOBAL.LANG = 'ENG' then
 DISP_RADIO_GROUPS('B', 'Item History Record');
 else
 DISP_RADIO_GROUPS('B', 'Fiche Historique Article');
 end if;
 ELSIF V_BTN = 'TWO.OPT3' THEN -- Letter C
 if :GLOBAL.LANG = 'ENG' then
 DISP_RADIO_GROUPS('C', 'Maj. Assy. History Record');
 else
 DISP_RADIO_GROUPS('C', 'Fiche Historique Article Principal');
 end if;
 ELSIF V_BTN = 'TWO.OPT4' THEN -- Letter D
 if :GLOBAL.LANG = 'ENG' then
 DISP_RADIO_GROUPS('D', 'APU History Record');
 else
 DISP_RADIO_GROUPS('D', 'Fiche Historique APU');
 end if;
 ELSIF V_BTN = 'TWO.OPT5' THEN -- Letter E
 DISP_RADIO_GROUPS('E', 'Component Data Record');
 :TWO.TITLE := NULL;
 CHK_AUTH('S358'||:GLOBAL.L);
 ELSIF V_BTN = 'TWO.OPT6' THEN -- Letter F
 DISP_RADIO_GROUPS('F', 'Component Data Summary');
 :TWO.TITLE := NULL;
 CHK_AUTH('RCOMPONENT'||:GLOBAL.L);
 ELSIF V_BTN = 'TWO.OPT7' THEN -- Letter G
 DISP_RADIO_GROUPS('G', 'Major Assy Summary Report');
 CHK_AUTH('RMAJAS'||:GLOBAL.L);
 ELSIF V_BTN = 'TWO.OPT8' THEN -- Letter H
 DISP_RADIO_GROUPS('H', 'Engine Usage Report');
 if :global.ac_type = '146' then
 CHK_AUTH('RENGREP146'||:GLOBAL.L);
 else
 CHK_AUTH('RENGREP'||:GLOBAL.L);
 end if;
 ELSIF V_BTN = 'TWO.OPT9' THEN -- Letter I
 DISP_RADIO_GROUPS('I', 'Transfer Data');
 CHK_AUTH('STRANS'||:GLOBAL.L);
 ELSIF V_BTN = 'TWO.OPT10' THEN -- Letter J
 DISP_RADIO_GROUPS('J', 'Software Configuration Record');
 CHK_AUTH('SWRA_DATA'||:GLOBAL.L);
 ELSIF V_BTN = 'TWO.OPT11' THEN -- Letter K
 DISP_RADIO_GROUPS('K', 'Non-Serialized Items');
 CHK_AUTH('RNSI'||:GLOBAL.L);
 END IF;

 COPY('','TWO.OPTION'); -- ICH TESTIG SEPT 24 ADDED


END;

ProgramUnit.Name: DO_BUTTON_ONEA
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE DO_BUTTON_ONEA IS
 V_BTN VARCHAR2(30);
BEGIN -- MMAIN_E form.
-- Created 2020/09/21 by Ian Hale (Hale Software Inc.)
-- For S2950070 Work Item 41629: 
-- Moved code from all the individual letter buttons
-- to keep the actions done all in one place.

 V_BTN := :SYSTEM.TRIGGER_ITEM;

 IF V_BTN = 'ONEA.OPT1' THEN -- Letter A
 if :global.ac_type in ('146','124','177','114','140', '130','115','138', '172') then
 CHK_AUTH('S335'||SUBSTR(:GLOBAL.AC_TYPE, 2,2)||:GLOBAL.L);
 elsif :global.ac_type = '30J' then
 CHK_AUTH('S33530J'||:GLOBAL.L);
 else
 CHK_AUTH('S335'||:GLOBAL.L);
 end if; 
 ELSIF V_BTN = 'ONEA.OPT2' THEN -- Letter B
 -- Jul 23, 2007, Calian, PL. SCR# 78.
 CHK_AUTH('S336'||:GLOBAL.L);
 ELSIF V_BTN = 'ONEA.OPT3' THEN -- Letter C
 if :GLOBAL.AC_TYPE = '146' then
 -- Added March 26, 2012, Hale Software Inc. - IHALE. SCR #79
 CHK_AUTH('S33846'||:GLOBAL.L);
 elsif :GLOBAL.AC_TYPE = '177' then 
 CHK_AUTH('S33877'||:GLOBAL.L);
 elsif :GLOBAL.AC_TYPE = '130' then 
 CHK_AUTH('S33830'||:GLOBAL.L);
 else
 message('This option available for AC Type 177, 146 and 130 only at this time.',ACKNOWLEDGE);
 SYNCHRONIZE;
 message('This option available for AC Type 177, 146 and 130 only at this time.',NO_ACKNOWLEDGE);
-- CHK_AUTH('S338'||:GLOBAL.L);
 -- Added 2020/10/07 by Ian Hale (Hale Software Inc.)
 -- For S2950070 Work Item 41629: 
 COPY('C','ONEA.CHOICE');
 POINT;
 COPY('','ONEA.OPTION');
 go_item('ONEA.OPTION');
 end if;
 ELSIF V_BTN = 'ONEA.OPT4' THEN -- Letter D
 :GLOBAL.SCREEN_TITLE := 'AIRCRAFT TYPE';
 CHK_AUTH('UT00_B');
 ELSIF V_BTN = 'ONEA.OPT5' THEN -- Letter E
 CHK_AUTH('S339A'||:GLOBAL.L);
 ELSIF V_BTN = 'ONEA.OPT6' THEN -- Letter F
 CHK_AUTH('S339B'||:GLOBAL.L);
 ELSIF V_BTN = 'ONEA.OPT7' THEN -- Letter G
 CHK_AUTH('S339C'||:GLOBAL.L);
 ELSIF V_BTN = 'ONEA.OPT8' THEN -- Letter H
 CHK_AUTH('S339D'||:GLOBAL.L);
 ELSIF V_BTN = 'ONEA.OPT9' THEN -- Letter I
 declare
 cnt number;
 begin
 -- If this AC Type exists in TBL47_WRA_LIST, 
 -- then call the S339EWRA screen, 
 -- otherwise call the old S339E screen
 select count(*) into cnt 
 from TBL47_WRA_LIST
 where ac_type = :global.ac_type;
 if cnt > 0 then 
 CHK_AUTH('S339EWRA'||:GLOBAL.L);
 else
 CHK_AUTH('S339E'||:GLOBAL.L);
 end if;
 end;
 ELSIF V_BTN = 'ONEA.OPT10' THEN -- Letter J
 GO_ITEM('FIVE.AC_NUMBER');
 ELSIF V_BTN = 'ONEA.OPT11' THEN -- Letter K
 if :GLOBAL.AC_TYPE = '146' then
 CHK_AUTH('S35146'||:GLOBAL.L);
 else
 CHK_AUTH('S351'||:GLOBAL.L);
 end if;
 ELSIF V_BTN = 'ONEA.OPT12' THEN -- Letter L
 CHK_AUTH('S352'||:GLOBAL.L);
 ELSIF V_BTN = 'ONEA.OPT13' THEN -- Letter M
 CHK_AUTH('S366'||:GLOBAL.L);
 ELSIF V_BTN = 'ONEA.OPT14' THEN -- Letter N
 CHK_AUTH('S367'||:GLOBAL.L);
 ELSIF V_BTN = 'ONEA.OPT15' THEN -- Letter O
 CHK_AUTH('SMEL'||:GLOBAL.L);
 ELSIF V_BTN = 'ONEA.OPT16' THEN -- Letter P
 CHK_AUTH('S3545'||:GLOBAL.L);
 ELSIF V_BTN = 'ONEA.OPT17' THEN -- Letter Q
 CHK_AUTH('S3545'||:GLOBAL.L);
 ELSIF V_BTN = 'ONEA.OPT18' THEN -- Letter R
 CHK_AUTH('S356'||:GLOBAL.L);
 ELSIF V_BTN = 'ONEA.OPT19' THEN -- Letter S

END;

ProgramUnit.Name: SET_TAB_BUTTONS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE SET_TAB_BUTTONS ( P_BLOCK IN VARCHAR, P_TAB IN VARCHAR ) IS
-- MMAIN_F form.
-- Created 2020/09/01 by Ian Hale (Hale Software Inc.)
-- For S2950070 Work Item 41629: 
-- Code was copied from WHEN-NEW-BLOCK-INSTANCE trigger
-- and modified to use each block name and tab name 
-- passed in as parameters.
-- This is called from the WHEN-NEW-FORM-INSTANCE trigger.

--Commented out the lines 'AND MENU_TAB = NVL(:SYSTEM.TAB_NEW_PAGE...' in the 3 cursor declarations below
--and replace each line with the one following it since SYSTEM.TAB_NEW_PAGE is null when Pg-Up/Pg-Down keys
--are used to navigate thru the tabs instead of the mouse.
--
--This correction prevents some enabled buttons from getting disabled and vice versa when the Pg-Up/Pg-Down keys are 
--used for tab navigation.
--RB, 28-Nov-2007
--
-- Modified 2020/2020/09/01 by Ian Hale (Hale Software Inc.)
-- For S2950070, Work Item 43532: 
-- Modified the queries to get separate individual user and role permisions.
-- The REPOSITORY query was removed because the normal permission rules
-- also apply to that database just like all the other datbases.
-- Individual user permission (if any) will override the role permission.

 X NUMBER;
 V_FIRST_ITEM VARCHAR2(1);

 CURSOR DIS_ROLE_CUR IS
 SELECT MENU_OPTION 
 FROM TBL43_ROLE_MENU_PERMISSIONS
 WHERE INSTR(:GLOBAL.ROLE_LIST, ROLE_NAME) > 0 
 AND PERMISSION = 'C'
 and menu_tab = P_TAB
 AND RADIO_LETTER IS NULL;

 CURSOR ENAB_ROLE_CUR IS
 SELECT MENU_OPTION 
 FROM TBL43_ROLE_MENU_PERMISSIONS
 WHERE INSTR(:GLOBAL.ROLE_LIST, ROLE_NAME) > 0 
 AND PERMISSION != 'C'
 and menu_tab = P_TAB
 AND RADIO_LETTER IS NULL;

--FJC20190125_S961454 USER permission settings override all others...
 CURSOR DIS_USER_CUR IS
 SELECT MENU_OPTION 
 FROM TBL43_ROLE_MENU_PERMISSIONS
 WHERE ROLE_NAME = :GLOBAL.USER 
 AND PERMISSION = 'C'
 and menu_tab = P_TAB
 AND RADIO_LETTER IS NULL;

--FJC20190125_S961454 USER permission settings override all others...
 CURSOR ENAB_USER_CUR IS
 SELECT MENU_OPTION 
 FROM TBL43_ROLE_MENU_PERMISSIONS
 WHERE ROLE_NAME = :GLOBAL.USER 
 AND PERMISSION != 'C'
 and menu_tab = P_TAB
 AND RADIO_LETTER IS NULL;

BEGIN

-- *************************************************
-- Enable ALL menu items by default for this tab 
-- incase no role or user name data is found on TBL43.
-- *************************************************
 FOR X IN 1..ASCII(NAME_IN('CHANGE_ACUIC.MAX_OPT_'||P_BLOCK ))-64 LOOP
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(P_BLOCK ||'.OPT'||X, ENABLED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 END LOOP;

-- *************************************************
-- Reset the appropriate menu items for this tab 
-- based on user role from data in TBL43.
-- *************************************************
 FOR DIS_R_REC IN DIS_ROLE_CUR LOOP
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(P_BLOCK ||'.OPT'||TO_CHAR(ASCII(DIS_R_REC.MENU_OPTION)-64),
 ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 END LOOP;

 FOR ENAB_R_REC IN ENAB_ROLE_CUR LOOP
 IF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY(P_BLOCK ||'.OPT'||TO_CHAR(ASCII(ENAB_R_REC.MENU_OPTION)-64),
 VISIBLE) = 'FALSE' 
 THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(P_BLOCK ||'.OPT'||TO_CHAR(ASCII(ENAB_R_REC.MENU_OPTION)-64),
 VISIBLE, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 END IF;
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(P_BLOCK ||'.OPT'||TO_CHAR(ASCII(ENAB_R_REC.MENU_OPTION)-64),
 ENABLED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 END LOOP;

--FJC20190125_S961454 USER permission settings override all others...
-- ************************************************************
-- Reset the appropriate menu items for this tab 
-- based on user name from data in TBL43, 
-- when any exist.
-- (In case option disabled for role, but enabled for user)
-- ************************************************************
 FOR DIS_U_REC IN DIS_USER_CUR LOOP
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(P_BLOCK||'.OPT'||TO_CHAR(ASCII(DIS_U_REC.MENU_OPTION)-64),
 ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 END LOOP;

 FOR ENAB_U_REC IN ENAB_USER_CUR LOOP
 IF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY(P_BLOCK ||'.OPT'||TO_CHAR(ASCII(ENAB_U_REC.MENU_OPTION)-64),
 VISIBLE) = 'FALSE' 
 THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(P_BLOCK ||'.OPT'||TO_CHAR(ASCII(ENAB_U_REC.MENU_OPTION)-64),
 VISIBLE, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 END IF;

 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(P_BLOCK||'.OPT'||TO_CHAR(ASCII(ENAB_U_REC.MENU_OPTION)-64),
 ENABLED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 END LOOP;

-- ******************************************************
-- Special access options for specific fleets or 
-- or override specific options.
-- ******************************************************
--FJC20190125_S961454 Hard-coded rules superceed user-defined permissions.

 IF P_BLOCK = 'ONE' THEN
 IF :GLOBAL.AC_TYPE = '177' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('one.opt5', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE); -- Fuel/APU
 ELSE
 -- Modified Apr 14, 2011, Hale Software Inc. - IHALE. SCR #2106
 -- use opt 18 instead of 17
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('ONEA.OPT19', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE); -- CF360
 END IF;
 IF :GLOBAL.AC_TYPE = '146' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('one.opt5', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE); -- Fuel/APU
 END IF; 
 IF :GLOBAL.AC_TYPE = '124' THEN 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('one.opt5', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE); -- Fuel/APU
 -- SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('THREE.OPT16', ENABLED, PROPERTY_TRUE); -- ASI Report
 -- ELSE
 -- SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('THREE.OPT16', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE); -- ASI Report
 END IF;
 -- Oct 29, 2015, PL. S304177. Changed button to display CT114 weekly maintenance report
 -- if logged in a/c type is 114.
 IF :GLOBAL.AC_TYPE NOT IN ('114', '130') THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('ONE.OPT12',ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE); -- CC130 Flight Summary Report
 ELSE
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('ONE.OPT12',ENABLED, PROPERTY_TRUE); -- CC130 Flight Summary Report
 IF :global.ac_type = '114' THEN
 set_item_property('ONE.OPT12', prompt_text, 'CT114 Weekly Maintenance Report');
 ELSIF :global.ac_type = '130' THEN
 set_item_property('ONE.OPT12', prompt_text, 'CCC130 Flight Summary Report'); 
 END IF;
 END IF;
 IF :GLOBAL.AC_TYPE != '114' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('ONE.OPT13',ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE); -- CC130 Flight Summary Report
 ELSE
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('ONE.OPT13',ENABLED, PROPERTY_TRUE); -- CC130 Flight Summary Report
 END IF;
-- ******************************************************

 ELSIF P_BLOCK = 'ONEA' THEN
 -- Modified Apr 14, 2011, Hale Software Inc. - IHALE. SCR #2106
 -- use ONEA.opt 15-17 instead of 14-16
 IF :GLOBAL.AC_TYPE = '177' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('ONEA.OPT15', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE); -- CF354
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('ONEA.OPT16', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE); -- CF355
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('ONEA.OPT17', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE); -- CF356 
 END IF;
-- ******************************************************

 ELSIF P_BLOCK = 'TWO' THEN
-- NULL; -- DO NOTHING ICH TESTING
-- copied from W-N-B-I form trigger
 :TWO.WUC := NULL;
 :TWO.SERIAL := NULL;
 :two.cf357_group := 'A';
 :two.cf358_group := 'A';
 :two.cf359_group := 'A';
 :two.cf361_group := 'A';

 select decode(:global.l, 
 'E','Engine History Record',
 'F','Historique des Moteurs') into :two.title from dual;
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('TWO.GO',ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);

 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF357_GROUP',VISIBLE, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF357_GROUP',ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF358_GROUP',VISIBLE, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF359_GROUP',VISIBLE, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF361_GROUP',VISIBLE, PROPERTY_FALSE);


-- ******************************************************

 ELSIF P_BLOCK = 'THREE' THEN
 IF :GLOBAL.AC_TYPE = '177' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('THREE.OPT15', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE); -- Disable PRINT ASI REPORT (CH124) for the 177
 END IF;

-- IF :GLOBAL.AC_TYPE = '124' THEN 
-- SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('THREE.OPT16', ENABLED, PROPERTY_TRUE); -- ASI Report
-- ELSE
-- SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('THREE.OPT16', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE); -- ASI Report
-- END IF;
-- ******************************************************

 ELSIF P_BLOCK = 'FOUR' THEN
 IF :GLOBAL.AC_TYPE = '177' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('FOUR.OPT4', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE); -- Bad Associated Records Display
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('FOUR.OPT6', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE); -- Does not apply to CC-177 
 END IF;
 IF :GLOBAL.USER = 'STUDENT' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('FOUR.OPT9', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE); -- E-sigs Management
 END IF; 
 END IF;
 
-- ******************************************************
-- END Special access options for specific fleets 
-- ******************************************************

 V_FIRST_ITEM := null;

 -- Allow for possiblity that Option 'A' is disabled & move default starting item to next enabled item.
 FOR X IN 1..ASCII(NAME_IN('CHANGE_ACUIC.MAX_OPT_'||P_BLOCK ))-64 LOOP
 IF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY(P_BLOCK ||'.OPT'||X,ENABLED) = 'TRUE' THEN
 V_FIRST_ITEM := CHR(X+64);
 EXIT;
 END IF;
 END LOOP;

 -- Modified 2020/09/01 by Ian Hale (Hale Software Inc.)
 -- For S2950070 Work Item 41629: 
 -- Modified to test for null value to prevent FRM-40105 error.
 IF V_FIRST_ITEM IS NULL THEN
 COPY('','CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_'||P_BLOCK);
 RETURN;
 END IF;

 COPY(V_FIRST_ITEM,'CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_'||P_BLOCK );
 COPY(V_FIRST_ITEM,P_BLOCK||'.CHOICE');

 set_item_property(P_BLOCK||'.OPT'||V_FIRST_ITEM,
 visual_attribute,'BG_COLOR');

END;

Trigger.Name: PRE-FORM
Trigger.TriggerText:
BEGIN -- MMAIN_E form PRE-FORM trigger.
 -- Created 2020/09/21 by Ian Hale (Hale Software Inc.)
 -- For S2950070, Work Item 43532: 
 -- Code moved from WHEN-NEW-FORM-INSTANCE trigger.

 --Used for called file language extension.
 :GLOBAL.L:= '_'||SUBSTR(:GLOBAL.LANG, 1,1);

/*---------------------------------------------- 
Store the highest button letter for each block
*/

-- July 24, 2007, Calian, PL. SCR# 78. Change 'V' to 'W'.
-- Modified Mar 3, 2009, Hale Software Inc. - IHALE. SCR #2107
-- Change block ONEA 'P' to 'Q'
-- Modified Apr 14, 2011, Hale Software Inc. - IHALE. SCR #2106
-- Change block ONEA 'Q' to 'R'
-- Nov 15, 2016, PL. S160094. Changed block ONEA to 'S'.
-- Jun 26, 2017, PL. S1108958. Changed max_opt_four to 'R.'
 :CHANGE_ACUIC.MAX_OPT_ONE := 'O';
 :CHANGE_ACUIC.MAX_OPT_ONEA := 'S';
 :CHANGE_ACUIC.MAX_OPT_TWO := 'K';
 :CHANGE_ACUIC.MAX_OPT_THREE := 'R';
 :CHANGE_ACUIC.MAX_OPT_FOUR := 'R';

/*-------------------------------------------*/

 -- Enable/Disable buttons according to user name and/or role permissions. 
 -- Find the first enabled button/text item on each tab page, if any.
 SET_TAB_BUTTONS( 'ONE', 'AC_REL' );
 SET_TAB_BUTTONS( 'ONEA', 'AC_REL2' );
 SET_TAB_BUTTONS( 'TWO', 'COMP_REL' );
 SET_TAB_BUTTONS( 'THREE', 'MAINT' );
 SET_TAB_BUTTONS( 'FOUR', 'AMCRO' );

END;

Trigger.Name: KEY-LISTVAL
Trigger.TriggerText:
-- Store where we were when we called the change AC Type stuff so we can go back to the same block

-- Oct 9, 2006, Calian, PL.
IF :SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK <> 'CHANGE_ACUIC' THEN
 :CHANGE_ACUIC.CAME_FROM := :SYSTEM.CURSOR_ITEM;
END IF;

if :SYSTEM.CURSOR_FIELD = :SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK||'.OPTION' then
 go_field ('CHANGE_ACUIC.AC_TYPE');
elsif :SYSTEM.CURSOR_FIELD = 'CHANGE_ACUIC.AC_TYPE' then
 list_values;
elsif :SYSTEM.CURSOR_FIELD = 'CHANGE_ACUIC.FIXER_UNIT' then
 list_values;
end if;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-TIMER-EXPIRED
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE -- FORM: MMAIN TRIGGER: WHEN-TIMER-EXPIRED
 v_timer_name VARCHAR2(30);
 v_cnt pls_integer;
BEGIN

 v_timer_name := get_application_property(timer_name);
 
 -- Check for site-to-site transfers from another base.
 -- May 13, 2015, PL. SCR# 2709.
 select count(*) into v_cnt from transfer_job_log_trn
 where (ac_type is null or ac_type = :global.ac_type)
 and status = 'WAITING';
 IF v_cnt > 0 THEN 
 if v_cnt = 1 then
 :one.trn_alert_msg := 'There is a transfer awaiting to be imported.';
 else
 :one.trn_alert_msg := 'There are '||v_cnt||' transfers awaiting to be imported.'; 
 end if;
 IF get_item_property('one.trn_alert_msg', visible) = 'FALSE' THEN
 set_item_property('one.trn_alert_msg', visible, property_true);
 set_item_property('one.trn_alert_msg', enabled, property_true);
 END IF;
-- Added AMCRO tab notification to be displayed to AMCRO for pending incoming transfers
-- SCR #3592 - SM - 8 Jun 2012 

 IF :global.blink = '1' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('one.trn_alert_msg', background_color, 'r400g0b0');
 if :global.lang = 'ENG' then
 SET_TAB_PAGE_PROPERTY('AMCRO',LABEL, '**AMCRO**');
 else 
 SET_TAB_PAGE_PROPERTY('AMCRO',LABEL, '**OCRMA**');
 end if;
 :global.blink := '2';
 ELSIF :global.blink = '2' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('one.trn_alert_msg', background_color, 'r999g999b999');
 if :global.lang = 'ENG' then
 SET_TAB_PAGE_PROPERTY('AMCRO',LABEL, ' AMCRO ');
 else 
 SET_TAB_PAGE_PROPERTY('AMCRO',LABEL, ' OCRMA ');
 end if;
 :global.blink := '1';
 END IF;
 ELSE 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('one.trn_alert_msg', visible, property_false);
 if :global.lang = 'ENG' then
 SET_TAB_PAGE_PROPERTY('AMCRO',LABEL, ' AMCRO ');
 else 
 SET_TAB_PAGE_PROPERTY('AMCRO',LABEL, ' OCRMA ');
 end if;
 END IF;
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-NEW-FORM-INSTANCE
Trigger.TriggerText:
Declare -- MMAIN_E form: WHEN-NEW-FORM-INSTANCE trigger.
 -- Modified 2020/10/05 by Ian Hale (Hale Software Inc.)
 -- For S2950070 Work Item 41629: 
 -- Reorder block ONEA button items to be after the display fields.

 v_CONNECT varchar2(50);

Begin

 --Used for called file language extension.
 :GLOBAL.L:= '_'||SUBSTR(:GLOBAL.LANG, 1,1);

 v_Connect := get_application_property(CONNECT_STRING);
 IF v_CONNECT = '' or NVL(length(v_connect), 0) = 0 then
 v_CONNECT := 'Local Database';
 end if;
 :one.connect := upper(v_CONNECT);
 :one.username := :Global.user;

 -- Modified 2020/08/31 by Ian Hale (Hale Software Inc.)
 -- For S2950070 Work Item 41629: 
 -- Added two lines from WHEN-NEW-BLOCK-INSTANCE trigger.
 :ONE.AC_TYPE := :GLOBAL.AC_TYPE;
 :ONE.FIXER_UNIT := :GLOBAL.FIXER;

 SET_AC_TYPE_SPECIFICS; -- Set special prompt text strings.

 -- Set the value to be displayed in the "Access Level" field
 IF INSTR(:GLOBAL.ROLE_LIST, 'CONTROL_RECORDS') > 0 THEN
 :ONE.USER_ROLE := 'AMCRO';
 ELSIF INSTR(:GLOBAL.ROLE_LIST, 'SERVICING') > 0 THEN
 :ONE.USER_ROLE := 'Servicing';
 ELSIF INSTR(:GLOBAL.ROLE_LIST, 'TECHNICIAN') > 0 THEN
 :ONE.USER_ROLE := 'Technician';
 ELSIF INSTR(:GLOBAL.ROLE_LIST, 'SUPERVISING') > 0 THEN
 :ONE.USER_ROLE := 'Supervisor';
 ELSIF INSTR(:GLOBAL.ROLE_LIST, 'VIEWING') > 0 THEN
 :ONE.USER_ROLE := 'Read Only';
 ELSIF INSTR(:GLOBAL.ROLE_LIST, 'FSR') > 0 THEN
 :ONE.USER_ROLE := 'FSR(Read Only)';
 ELSE
 :ONE.USER_ROLE := 'None';
 END IF;

 -- Added 2020/09/17 by Ian Hale (Hale Software Inc.)
 -- For S2950070, Work Item 43532: 
 GO_BLOCK('ONE');
 SYNCHRONIZE;

 -- Added 2020/09/18 by Ian Hale (Hale Software Inc.)
 -- For S2950070, Work Item 43532: 
 -- Modified to check and find the first enabled button/text item on each tab page.
 -- Sets the tab page to disabled if no first enabled button is found.
 IF :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_ONE IS NULL AND 
 :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_ONEA IS NULL AND
 :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_TWO IS NULL AND
 :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_THREE IS NULL AND
 :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_FOUR IS NULL 
 THEN
 MESSAGE('No menu options are accessible to you for this menu.',ACKNOWLEDGE);
 EXIT_FORM(NO_VALIDATE);
 END IF;

 -- Navigate to first active block. 
 -- (There should always be one at this point)
 IF :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_ONE IS NULL THEN
 if :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_ONEA IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('ONEA');
 elsif :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_TWO IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('TWO');
 elsif :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_THREE IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('THREE');
 elsif :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_FOUR IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('FOUR');
 end if;
 set_tab_page_property('AC_REL', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 END IF;

 IF :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_ONEA IS NULL THEN
 if :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_ONE IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('ONE');
 elsif :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_TWO IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('TWO');
 elsif :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_THREE IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('THREE');
 elsif :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_FOUR IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('FOUR');
 end if;
 set_tab_page_property('AC_REL2', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 END IF;

 IF :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_TWO IS NULL THEN
 if :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_ONE IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('ONE');
 elsif :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_ONEA IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('ONEA');
 elsif :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_THREE IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('THREE');
 elsif :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_FOUR IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('FOUR');
 end if;
 set_tab_page_property('COMP_REL', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 END IF;

 IF :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_THREE IS NULL THEN
 if :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_ONE IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('ONE');
 elsif :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_ONEA IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('ONEA');
 elsif :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_TWO IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('TWO');
 elsif :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_THREE IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('THREE');
 end if;
 set_tab_page_property('MAINT', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 END IF;

 IF :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_FOUR IS NULL THEN
 if :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_ONE IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('ONE');
 elsif :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_ONEA IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('ONEA');
 elsif :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_TWO IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('TWO');
 elsif :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_THREE IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('THREE');
 end if;
 set_tab_page_property('AMCRO', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 END IF;

 -- Make all changes visible.
 SYNCHRONIZE;

--Exception
-- WHEN OTHERS THEN
-- MESSAGE('WNFI END: EXCEPTION TRIGGERED SOMEWHERE');
End;

Trigger.Name: KEY-COMMIT
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK = 'CHANGE_ACUIC' then
 GO_BLOCK ('ONE');
end if;

Trigger.Name: KEY-EXIT
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK = 'CHANGE_ACUIC' then
 :CHANGE_ACUIC.AC_TYPE := '';
 :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIXER_UNIT := '';
 GO_BLOCK ('ONE');
elsif :system.current_block = 'FIVE' then
 :FIVE.AC_NUMBER := NULL;
 -- Modified 2020/10/08 by Ian Hale (Hale Software Inc.)
 -- For S2950070, Work Item 43532: 
 -- Navigate back to the menu button.
 go_block('ONEA');
else
-- clear_form;
 EXIT_FORM(NO_VALIDATE) ;
end if;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-WINDOW-CLOSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK = 'ONE' then
 DO_KEY('EXIT');
elsif :SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK = 'CHANGE_ACUIC' then
 :CHANGE_ACUIC.AC_TYPE := '';
 :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIXER_UNIT := '';
 GO_BLOCK ('ONE');
end if;

Trigger.Name: KEY-PREV-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :SYSTEM.CURSOR_FIELD = 'CHANGE_ACUIC.AC_TYPE' then
 GO_ITEM('ONE.OPTION');
elsif :SYSTEM.CURSOR_FIELD = 'CHANGE_ACUIC.FIXER_UNIT' then
 GO_ITEM('CHANGE_ACUIC.AC_TYPE');
end if;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-WINDOW-ACTIVATED
Trigger.TriggerText:
BEGIN

 :one.ac_type := :global.ac_type;
 :one.fixer_unit := :global.fixer;

 -- Oct 27, 2006, Calian, PL.
 IF :SYSTEM.EVENT_WINDOW = 'WINDOW350' THEN
 REPLACE_MENU('REPORTS_MENU');
 ELSE
 REPLACE_MENU('menu_menu');
 END IF;

 -- Make sure radio items are re-enabled when returning from a called form
 IF :SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK = 'TWO' THEN
 IF :TWO.WUC IS NOT NULL AND :TWO.SERIAL IS NOT NULL THEN
 GO_ITEM('TWO.SERIAL');
 NEXT_ITEM;

 -- Modified 2020/10/01 by Ian Hale (Hale Software Inc.)
 -- For S2950070, Work Item 43532: 
 -- Navigate back to the radio button group.
 IF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF357_GROUP',VISIBLE) = 'TRUE' THEN 
 GO_ITEM('TWO.CF357_GROUP');
 ELSIF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF358_GROUP',VISIBLE) = 'TRUE' THEN 
 GO_ITEM('TWO.CF358_GROUP');
 ELSIF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF359_GROUP',VISIBLE) = 'TRUE' THEN 
 GO_ITEM('TWO.CF359_GROUP');
 ELSIF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CF361_GROUP',VISIBLE) = 'TRUE' THEN 
 GO_ITEM('TWO.CF361_GROUP');
 END IF;
 SYNCHRONIZE;
 RETURN;
 END IF;
 END IF;

 -- Don't try to go to OPTION field in Block FIVE (CF350 menu)
 IF :SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK = 'FIVE' THEN
 IF :FIVE.AC_NUMBER IS NOT NULL THEN
 GO_ITEM('FIVE.CF350_GROUP');
 ELSE
 GO_ITEM('FIVE.AC_NUMBER');
 END IF;
 ELSE
 IF :SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK != 'CHANGE_ACUIC' THEN
 GO_ITEM(:SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK||'.OPTION');
 END IF;
 END IF;

END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-TAB-PAGE-CHANGED
Trigger.TriggerText:
BEGIN -- MMAIN_E form: WHEN-TAB-PAGE-CHANGED trigger. 

 IF :SYSTEM.TAB_NEW_PAGE = 'AC_REL' THEN
 GO_ITEM('ONE.OPTION');
 ELSIF :SYSTEM.TAB_NEW_PAGE = 'AC_REL2' THEN
 GO_ITEM('ONEA.OPTION');
 ELSIF :SYSTEM.TAB_NEW_PAGE = 'COMP_REL' THEN
 GO_ITEM('TWO.OPTION');
 ELSIF :SYSTEM.TAB_NEW_PAGE = 'MAINT' THEN
 GO_ITEM('THREE.OPTION');
 ELSIF :SYSTEM.TAB_NEW_PAGE = 'AMCRO' THEN
 GO_ITEM('FOUR.OPTION');
 END IF;
 -- Modified 2020/09/16 by Ian Hale (Hale Software Inc.)
 -- For S2950070, Work Item 43532: 
 -- Moved to NEW LOCATION from top line to avoid FRM-40105 error.
 -- Use the new first item field instead of the default A value.
-- COPY('A',:SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK||'.CHOICE'); 
 COPY(NAME_IN('CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_'||:SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK), :SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK||'.CHOICE'); 

END;

Trigger.Name: KEY-SCRDOWN
Trigger.TriggerText:
BEGIN -- MMAIN_E form KEY-SCRDOWN trigger.
--
-- Ensure that the next enabled tab is displayed, if any.
--
-- Modified 2020/09/16 by Ian Hale (Hale Software Inc.)
-- For S2950070 Work Item 41629: 
-- Added tests for enabled tabs to prevent FRM-40105 error.
-- Modified 2020/10/08 by Ian Hale (Hale Software Inc.)
-- Use the block first item to check for active Tab Page. 
 IF :SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK = 'ONE' THEN
 if :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_ONEA IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('ONEA');
 elsif :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_TWO IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('TWO');
 elsif :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_THREE IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('THREE');
 elsif :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_FOUR IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('FOUR');
 end if;

 ELSIF :SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK = 'ONEA' THEN
 if :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_TWO IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('TWO');
 elsif :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_THREE IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('THREE');
 elsif :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_FOUR IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('FOUR');
 elsif :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_ONE IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('ONE');
 end if;

 ELSIF :SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK = 'TWO' THEN
 if :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_THREE IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('THREE');
 elsif :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_FOUR IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('FOUR');
 elsif :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_ONE IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('ONE');
 elsif :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_ONEA IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('ONEA');
 end if;
 
 ELSIF :SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK = 'THREE' THEN
 if :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_FOUR IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('FOUR');
 elsif :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_ONE IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('ONE');
 elsif :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_ONEA IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('ONEA');
 elsif :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_TWO IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('TWO');
 end if;

 ELSIF :SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK = 'FOUR' THEN
 if :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_ONE IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('ONE');
 elsif :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_ONEA IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('ONEA');
 elsif :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_TWO IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('TWO');
 elsif :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_THREE IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('THREE');
 end if;

 END IF;

END;

Trigger.Name: KEY-SCRUP
Trigger.TriggerText:
BEGIN -- MMAIN_E form KEY-SCRUP trigger.
-- Ensure that the previous enabled tab is displayed, if any.
--
-- Modified 2020/08/31 by Ian Hale (Hale Software Inc.)
-- For S2950070, Work Item 43532: 
-- Added tests for enabled tabs to prevent FRM-40105 error.
-- Modified 2020/10/08 by Ian Hale (Hale Software Inc.)
-- Use the block first item to check for active Tab Page. 
 IF :SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK = 'ONE' THEN
 if :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_FOUR IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('FOUR');
 elsif :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_THREE IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('THREE');
 elsif :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_TWO IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('TWO');
 elsif :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_ONEA IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('ONEA');
 end if;

 ELSIF :SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK = 'ONEA' THEN
 if :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_ONE IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('ONE');
 elsif :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_FOUR IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('FOUR');
 elsif :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_THREE IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('THREE');
 elsif :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_TWO IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('TWO');
 end if;

 ELSIF :SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK = 'TWO' THEN
 if :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_ONEA IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('ONEA');
 elsif :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_ONE IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('ONE');
 elsif :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_FOUR IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('FOUR');
 elsif :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_THREE IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('THREE');
 end if;
 
 ELSIF :SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK = 'THREE' THEN
 if :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_TWO IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('TWO');
 elsif :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_ONEA IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('ONEA');
 elsif :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_ONE IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('ONE');
 elsif :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_FOUR IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('FOUR');
 end if;

 ELSIF :SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK = 'FOUR' THEN
 if :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_THREE IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('THREE');
 elsif :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_TWO IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('TWO');
 elsif :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_ONEA IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('ONEA');
 elsif :CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_ONE IS NOT NULL then
 GO_BLOCK('ONE');
 end if;

 END IF;

END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-NEW-BLOCK-INSTANCE
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE -- MMAIN_E form: WHEN-NEW-BLOCK-INSTANCE trigger. 

 -- Modified 2020/08/05 by Ian Hale (Hale Software Inc.)
 -- For S2950070, Work Item 43532: 
 -- Moved most of the original code to a new procedure,
 -- SET_TAB_BUTTONS, that is called when the form first starts. 

 V_FIRST_ITEM VARCHAR2(1);

BEGIN

 SET_AC_TYPE_SPECIFICS; -- Set special prompt text strings.

 IF :SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK IN ('FIVE','CHANGE_ACUIC') THEN
 GOTO SKIP_ITEMSET;
 END IF;

 -- Modified 2020/09/21 by Ian Hale (Hale Software Inc.)
 -- For S2950070 Work Item 41629: 
 -- Re-set permissions in case A/C Type or Unit was changed.
 IF :SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK = 'ONE' THEN
 SET_TAB_BUTTONS( 'ONE', 'AC_REL' );
 ELSIF :SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK = 'ONEA' THEN
 SET_TAB_BUTTONS( 'ONEA', 'AC_REL2' );
 ELSIF :SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK = 'TWO' THEN
 SET_TAB_BUTTONS( 'TWO', 'COMP_REL' );
 ELSIF :SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK = 'THREE' THEN
 SET_TAB_BUTTONS( 'THREE', 'MAINT' );
 ELSIF :SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK = 'FOUR' THEN
 SET_TAB_BUTTONS( 'FOUR', 'AMCRO' );
 END IF;

 -- Modified 2020/09/21 by Ian Hale (Hale Software Inc.)
 -- For S2950070 Work Item 41629: 
 -- Use new first item field to test for null value to prevent FRM-40105 error.
 V_FIRST_ITEM := NAME_IN('CHANGE_ACUIC.FIRST_ITEM_'||:SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK);
 IF V_FIRST_ITEM IS NOT NULL THEN
 set_item_property(:SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK||'.OPT'||V_FIRST_ITEM,
 visual_attribute,'BG_COLOR');

 COPY(V_FIRST_ITEM,:SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK||'.CHOICE');
 :ONE.AC_TYPE := :GLOBAL.AC_TYPE;
 :ONE.FIXER_UNIT := :GLOBAL.FIXER;
 POINT;
 END IF;

 GO_ITEM(:SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK||'.OPTION');

-- **************************
<<SKIP_ITEMSET>> 

 IF :SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK = 'FIVE' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('FIVE.CF350_GROUP',ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('FIVE.GO',ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 :five.ac_type := :global.ac_type;
 END IF;

 IF :SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK NOT IN ('FIVE','CHANGE_ACUIC') THEN
 GO_ITEM(:SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK||'.OPTION');
 END IF;

END; -- Original block

-- Only flash message if Opt M (Transfer Menu) is enabled for this user...)
-- Commented out to allow AMCRO tab notification to be displayed to AMCRO 
-- for transfers regardless if they are in the AMCRO tab or not
-- SCR #3592 - SM - 8 Jun 2012 
--IF :SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK = 'FOUR' THEN
IF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY('FOUR.OPT13',ENABLED) = 'TRUE' THEN

 DECLARE
 sec_timer TIMER;
 one_sec NUMBER(7) := 1000;
 tm_id Timer;
 BEGIN
 DEFAULT_VALUE( '0', 'global.query_mode' ) ;
 -- Jan 31, 2005, Calian, PL. SCR# 1613.
 -- Create a TIMER to make text message blink when there are data
 -- in the TRN tables awaiting to import into main tables.
 :GLOBAL.blink := '1';
 tm_id := Find_Timer('import_waiting') ; 
 if id_null(tm_id) then
 sec_timer := CREATE_TIMER('import_waiting', one_sec, REPEAT);
 end if;
 END;
END IF;

--This is to correct navigation to the appropriate block.item when the Pg-Up/Pg-Down keys are 
--used for tab navigation. 
--
--The COPY statements were originally in the WHEN-TAB-PAGE-CHANGED trigger at form level but 
--SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK is not returning the correct value when fired from said trigger
--when the Pg-Up/Pg-Down keys are used for tab navigation instead of using the mouse. This bug
--has the effect of disabling some enabled items and vice versa.
--RB, 28-Nov-2007
--
-- Modified 2020/09/21 by Ian Hale (Hale Software Inc.)
-- For S2950070 Work Item 41629: 
-- Removed copy statements not needed here anymore.
-- Copy to choice is done in the set tab buttons procedure.
begin
 if :SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK in ('ONE','ONEA','TWO','THREE','FOUR')
 then
 GO_ITEM(:SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK||'.OPTION');
 end if;
end;

Trigger.Name: KEY-PRINT
Trigger.TriggerText: GO_BLOCK ('CHANGE_ACUIC');

Trigger.Name: KEY-OTHERS
Trigger.TriggerText: NULL ;
